Formed in Germany right at the end of the sixties by guitarist Rudolf Schenker, the Scorpions released a number of successful albums in the seventies before exploding globally in the eighties and early nineties with hits such as Rock You Like A Hurricane and Wind Of Change. This concert was recorded in 2000 with the world famous Berliner Philharmoniker orchestra as part of Berlin's millennium celebrations. It contains a string of Scorpions classics performed by the band with full orchestral support.
